mapper.select: SELECT UUID() AS id, m.goods_id, g.`name`AS goods_name, m.machine_id, m.name AS activity_name, m.activity_id, m.activity_type, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS submit_time FROM inno72_goods g right JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT img.goods_id,m.id AS machine_id,i.`name`,i.id AS activity_id,1 AS activity_type FROM inno72_interact_machine_goods img LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.id = img.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time imt ON im.id = imt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = im.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact i ON i.id =im.interact_id WHERE m.machine_status=4 and i.is_delete=0 AND i.`status`=1 AND img.type=0 AND NOW() BETWEEN imt.start_time AND imt.end_time AND NOW() BETWEEN img.start_time AND img.end_time UNION SELECT apg.prize_id AS goods_id,m.id AS machine_id,a.`name`,ap.id AS activity_id,0 AS activity_type FROM inno72_activity_plan_game_result apg LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.activity_plan_id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = apm.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity a ON a.id =ap.activity_id WHERE m.machine_status=4 and ap.is_delete = 0 AND apg.prize_type = 1 AND NOW( ) BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time ) m )m ON m.goods_id=g.id ORDER BY m.machine_id
